titles.title: Preventive Care Coverage Notification Act
A bill to require employers to notify employees and prospective employees of exemptions from otherwise required coverage of health services under group health plans.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 7/17/2014--Introduced. Preventive Care Coverage Notification Act - Requires the Secretary of Health and Human Services (HHS), the Secretary of Labor, and the Secretary of the Treasury to jointly develop requirements for employers exempted from covering mandated health services to notify current and prospective employees of the employer's exemption and provide employees with a description of the specific items and services that are not covered.
